features: 💎【Easy Installation】Simplify the application process! Featuring automatic alignment functionality, enjoy a quick and easy installation. Just slide it on in a few seconds, and the screen protector will perfectly apply to your iPhone 14 Plus 6.7-inch. No more worries about alignment and bubble issues, installation has never been so easy. Friendly Reminder: Please watch the installation video before you begin.

💎【Precise Cutouts and Responsive Touch】This protective film covers the iPhone 14 Plus 6.7-inch, ensuring you feel as if there's nothing on your iPhone screen. Featuring a fine oleophobic coating, it effectively resists scratches, oil, and fingerprints, keeping your camera and sensors in perfect condition. Enjoy the same touch sensitivity, feel, and response on your iPhone 14 Plus 6.7-inch as you would with the original screen.

💎【Comprehensive Protection & Crystal Clarity】Preserve the quality and clarity of your iPhone 14 Plus 6.7-inch display without sacrificing protection. EZ-GLAZ Clear Coatings, made of advanced materials, outperform other options on the market. Designed for those who appreciate the naked-screen feel, these coatings are virtually invisible to both sight and touch. Relish in the same original clarity while relying on our trusted screen protection to prevent blemishes on your iPhone 14 Plus 6.7-inch.

💎【AR Technology for Superior Night Shooting Performance】Our camera lens protectors for iPhone 14 Plus 6.7-inch offer an unparalleled photo-taking experience. They combine Augmented Reality seamless fusion, glare-shielding technology, and an upgraded "Night Flash Circle." With enhanced light transmission and no need for a flash hole, they ensure exceptional photo and video quality in any lighting, including nighttime environments with flash enabled. Enjoy ultra-clear viewing day and night.

❤️【365-Day Worry-Free Warranty】With EZ-GLAZ, you not only get 4 packs of Screen Protectors and 2 packs of Camera Lens Protectors for your iPhone 14 Plus 6.7-inch, but also our hassle-free 365-day warranty. (FREE Replacement, no need to apply for a return, and no fees required. Just contact us.) If you accidentally order the wrong size, fail at installation, or encounter any other issues, feel free to let us know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At first I assumed it was going to be like every single other brand, bubbles, too dark to see outside with glasses, brake easy , etc. with all honestly I am mind blown. The installation could not be any more easy. The finish is crispy clean and exact fit. This is the first privacy screen protector that has no bubbles, super clear look in any situation, strong hold, I forget I even have a privacy screen protector at times. Over all I would say this product is the way to go 5 stars 2 thumbs up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean Look, Easy Install
reviews.reviewText: In a digital era where screens are an extension of ourselves, safeguarding their sanctity becomes paramount. Enter these privacy screen protectors, an ensemble of sheer brilliance at a value that might just make you do a double-take.Starting with the installation, these protectors have certainly raised the bar. The inclusion of an alignment frame is nothing short of a masterstroke, turning what was once a tricky endeavor into a fuss-free, seamless experience. One can only marvel at the effortless precision.Aesthetically speaking, these protectors exude a suave sophistication with their low-profile black finish. It's a refreshing departure from the garish, reflective hues that often plague other screen protectors. It's discreet, it's elegant, it's exactly what a screen protector should be.Functionality-wise, they truly shine. The fingerprint resistance ensures your screen remains as pristine as a freshly polished mirror, while the rounded edges provide a tactile comfort, making swipes and gestures an absolute joy. Furthermore, their impeccable compatibility with cases just adds another feather to their cap.In conclusion, this 4-pack isn't just about protection, it's about enhancing the overall user experience. With a fusion of design, functionality, and affordability, they've carved a niche for themselves in a saturated market. A true testament to the adage: quality need not break the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very hesitant about this. However, after putting it on my phone, I was blown away how easy it was and it is so perfect it’s unreal not a single bubble. It works extremely well. The privacy part is great the best I’ve seen out of most of what I’ve tried before. This is great quality and I am a permanent customer I highly recommend. Thank you for finally making a screen protector. That’s worth everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice product for the price!
reviews.reviewText: All in all, these screen protectors are very nice!! They include a tool that makes it so EASY to apply it onto your phone, and it mostly leaves no air bubbles between the screen and the protector. (They usually disappear by pushing it out with your thumbs or with time)The privacy feature is well made, the only thing I had a problem with was that it does dim the brightness by a significant tiny amount, but I also look at it as a plus since it can help reduce eye strain with bright displays! An extra note, the protector will have a sort of screen effect that will make it seem “fuzzy” for a lack of a better word due to how the privacy feature works. For me, it is no problem as it makes the screen seem “vintage” and does not effect screen resolution or clarity, BUT might be a downside for other people.It also comes with four protectors which will help when it will inevitably deteriorate or break, saves my wallet a little extra cash for when that happens.For the quality, quantity, and the price, this product is a must have if you are in the market for privacy screens, with some minor caveats. I give this product an 8.5/10. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can’t tell you how time consuming other iPhone screen protectors are to put on. It literally takes me so much time just to line up the dang thing then I find out there’s bubbles. Very frustrating. But this product has made that process so much easier, it’s already lined up. And the little swipes thing with you finger helps so much cause not only is there no bubbles, but it’s relaxing to watch to. Oh! And the privacy screen works amazingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the easiest screen protectors I have used. I had it put on and a perfect fit in less than 4 seconds. It’s great quality, easy instructions and comes with multiple protectors and 2 camera protectors which is also easy to line up and install. Will definitely get again if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality & Easy to Put On
reviews.reviewText: The screen goes on so easy & it looks nice. No bubbles! The privacy feature works great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warning: Your Battery May Die Faster
reviews.reviewText: I installed the privacy screen protector this morning, and so far I have been really pleased. A solid three stars, and maybe 4 stars after a few days of use.First off, it was very easy to install. I had to take off my old screen protector, so there wasn't any dust, which is something that always seems to get caught under my screens. At first, I was a little disappointed, because there were bubbles. But as the screen protector has settled, they have already gone away. I also like that it hides the pre-existing scratches that are already on my phone, due to me neglecting to cover the screen right away. I also could not get rid of the bubble at the top. It took me a moment to realize it was a clear circle so that the camera would not be blocked. In other reviews there were complaints that the screen blocked face ID, so this could be the fix.Within a few minutes of having installed it, I noticed that at my current brightness level, which is not high, I could barely see the screen. If you read my headline, and scratched your head, this is what I mean by your battery may die faster. I had to turn the brightness way up so I could see. But like getting use to a new pair of glasses, it may just be my eyes need to adjust.My only other complaint is that the screen privacy only works is portrait mode. If you put the phone into landscape mode because you are playing a game, trying to see a webpage better, etc. keep in mind that if you are viewing something embarrassing, it probably will be seen in landscape mode.I bought this screen protector because I get tired of strangers looking over my shoulder when my phone is out. And if I am honest, people who always seem to be walking by my desk when I am taking a mental break do not need to see I am just playing a game. It just better be a game in portrait mode.

The screen protectors in this kit are great! At first I was a bit hesitant with the installation kit since I've never used this style before. I'm happy to report that they are easy to install. The kit comes with everything needed (screen cleaners, dust removers etc). Since it comes with 4 screen protectors, this kit provides excellent value and we should likely get at least a year out of them.The added bonus is the back lens camera cover too. Works well and doesn't seem to interfere with the camera.A+++
The plastic part that goes around the screen protector to place it on my work phone is perfect. No issues whatsoever. It went on perfectly and no air bubbles.
Very easy to install, no bubble problem, everything included no need spend extra money for back camera glass. After installing touch work smoothly.
Privacy is good with the product and it doesn’t affect brightness when looking directly on the screen. Good product. Easily installed as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: It lives up to its name!
reviews.reviewText: As a realtor we sometimes get sensitive information. I can now review with confidence of knowing no one will be looking over my shoulder!
